mapper.delete: delete blade_post_menu where post_id=#{param1} and type=#{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, menu_id, post_id, a.type FROM blade_post_menu a INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM blade_menu WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT shangji.id FROM blade_menu shangji, blade_menu xiaji WHERE xiaji.parent_id = shangji.id AND shangji.type = #{type} ) AND type=#{type} ) b ON a.menu_id=b.id and post_id = #{postId} AND a.type = #{type}
SELECT a.id, menu_id, post_id, a.type FROM blade_post_menu a INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM blade_business ) b ON a.menu_id=b.id and post_id = #{postId} AND a.type = #{type}

SELECT a.id, menu_id, post_id, a.type FROM blade_post_menu a INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM blade_app WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT shangji.id FROM blade_app shangji, blade_app xiaji WHERE xiaji.parent_id = shangji.id ) ) b ON a.menu_id=b.id and post_id = #{postId} AND a.type = #{type}
